verbs.description: [ARG1: pittsburgh synagogue shooting suspect] [V: appears] [ARGM-LOC: in federal court] [ARGM-TMP: after release from hospital robert bowers made his first appearance in court monday facing federal charges that include obstruction of exercise of religious beliefs resulting in death and use of a firearm to commit murder during a crime of violence he also faces state charges including 11 counts of homicide robert bowers bowers los angeles times magistrate judge robert mitchell pittsburgh synagogue stephanie waite allegheny general hospital united states district] court
